ctu_text: \n**Step 10:** Submit the application form and take out the print of the application for future reference. The applicant can note down the application number to track the application status by logging into the portal using their User ID and Password. \n**Note 01:** The student has to apply online to avail of this scheme. Students who are approved online by the concerned Deputy Director, Office of Scheduled Castes Welfare after applying online will be paid after completion of training.
